entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or drizzle late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
